cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 16th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 16th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 10 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
10 Bed Share + 2 Ensuite is very roomy, light and airy.  Amazing shower facilities at a 1:5 ratio in a big dorm.  You won't believe the size of the room! Perfect space to meet lots of friends and great for group bookings.

A/C and equipped with USB port

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Deluxe 6 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Enjoy some privacy with curtains on each bunk of our 6-share room with ensuite. Featuring a balcony and a view, this room has A /C and is equipped with a hair dryer, personal power points, bed lights, personal shelves and a secure locker units.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 4 Bed Privacy Share + Attached Ensuite with bathroom right outside your door is the ultimate space for that single traveller, a couple of friends or group of 4.  A/C and equipped with double power point, bed light, personal shelf and secure locker unit.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
4 Bed Privacy Share + Ensuite to yourselves is the ultimate space for that single traveller, a couple of friends or group of 4.  

A/C and equipped with double power point, bed light, your own personal shelf and a secure locker unit.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only

dorms.name: Deluxe 6 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 6 Privacy Bed (Female) + Ensuite is a popular choice for women. Those extra things we need like curtains on each bunk for privacy, a towel, hairdryer, straightener - you get it all! Air conditioning keeps this room cool in summer and warm in winter.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Superior Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private Queen + Ensuite & Courtyard is the perfect cheeky Noosa escape. Your own private space set amongst the tropical garden courtyard but enjoy the vibe of the hostel.  Perfect for a minimum 1 night stay close to everything in Noosa.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
